name: High Jumpers
description:
High Jumpers:

Simple and Super addictive Retro Arcade Style Gameplay.

Use the left and right arrows to move your player side to side and

Press the jump button to precisely time the falling piece to bump it with your players head.
Bonus Score Inrease when Player gets 3 hits in a row with out touching the side walls.

+3 Trophy System Based On Score
0ver 8 unlockable Crazy and Cool Pixel Style characters
" Look for Halloween Bunny "
"Takin It Back to the Classic Old School"

Use the left and right arrows to move your player side to side and
Press the jump button to precisely time the falling piece to bump it with your players head.

Compete Worldwide with the Game Center Leaderboard & Tweet High Score from within the game.
